item.content:encoded: Google is forced to sell Chrome. Meta buys it. Browsers are only valuable as a means of delivering advertising outcomes, and Meta‚Äôs capabilities surpass all other potential bidders. Meta Chrome incentivizes log-in. Some substantial proportion of Chrome users are now logged in

item.content:encoded: Really important econ theory paper on personalized medicine: huge huge benefits from AI-driven personalized therapies (oncology is basically predictions of tumor behavior...), but only if regulatory environment focuses on inventive process rather than output.

item.content:encoded: On a per capita basis, there was over TWICE as much fentanyl seized by the Canadians from the USA in 2024, as the reverse! This is an absurd argument to make regarding tariff policies.

item.content:encoded: Analog companies are on the fireline with China competition. TI sees share gain opportunities vs Western peers. Within China, 15% local, 15% TI and 70% western & Japanese suppliers. TI's vertical advantage comes in full force here as TI can price it competitively in even price
